channel.title: How to make a server for moparscape from scratch
channel.description:
iv never made a server before i dont know wat to do or anything i wanna know how to make a server from scratch it would be helpfull if u made a video then posted it on this thread but u can write it to but id rather like video but idk.... i just wanna make a server
thxs peeps for ur help :) [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Posting in the wrong section.[/center]

item.title: How to make a server for moparscape from scratch
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

just click this fhking link - www.moparisthebest.com/smf

it will take you to the forums that this sort of thread is supposed to be posted in. You have broken the rules alot in this thread. I hope you recieve a mute.

item.title: How to make a server for moparscape from scratch
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:131230”]Learn java, but before that learn to go to Moparscape.org/smf and post what you need help with in the RIGHT SECTION.
Play around with other peoples servers first and then think of coding ;)[/quote]

No no no… Bad bad bad. Private servers are crap Java tbh.

[quote=“sonsofgod2, post:3, topic:131228”]i know like al0t of codings i just down know how to start the server…

it shows on the infront of moparscape but it doesnt work…[/quote]

moparisthebest.com/smf
